testcase.name: HTTPClient should capture a Net::HTTP.get request
HTTPClient captured request should return headers with the #[](key) method
HTTPClient captured request should return the HTTP status with the #status method
HTTPClient captured request should return the HTTP body with the #body method

failure.message: failed HTTPClient captured request should return the HTTP body with the #body method
